snippet.title: Oir COMING SOON
snippet.description:
A music game of memory, rhythm and skill.

Oir is the first generative music game for iOS. Easy to learn, hard to master: just repeat the melody to unlock new levels. 

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/oir/id1282157561?l=es&ls=1&mt=8

“Simon on steroids” (McBride)

“Addictive gameplay” (Tembac)

“Best iOS music game” (S3F Magazine)

Features: 
Music driven gameplay.
Powerups.
Unlockable instruments: Piano, Electric guitar, Harp, Synth, Trumpet, Rhodes and much more.
Different gameplay modes.
Adaptable BPM.

From zero to professional, a music game that everybody loves. Start learning music and enjoy the beat!

Features: 
Music driven gameplay.

Unlockable instruments: Piano, Electric guitar, Harp, Synth, Trumpet, Rhodes and much more.
Different gameplay modes.

From zero to professional, a music game that everybody loves. Start learning music and enjoy the beat!
